document_data.name: ''Kluusar's Chain of Warding''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Kluusar's chain of warding''''' was the unique [[enchanted]] [[amulet]] that once belonged to [[Kluusar]], an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]], buried in the [[Dwarven Dungeons]].
document_data.Description: This amulet was a necklace decorated with three magic symbols.
document_data.Powers: ''Kluusar's chain of warding'' possessed several useful magical properties. It possessed a ''+1'' enchantment to defense, increased the wearer's fortitude, and increased their resistance to magic. Additionally, this chain held six charges of the ''[[lesser globe of invulnerability]].''
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Kluusar's chain of warding'' could be found far away from its master's tomb in the Dwarven Dungeons of Myth Drannor. This magic necklace was discovered by a [[dark naga]] who laired in the [[Elven Catacombs]]' First Cellars, within an ancient library. The naga hoarded treasures and had the booty guarded by enslaved [[orog]]s.
